languages.text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}时，恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，且在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}时，恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，且在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или прибегая к {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g}, персонаж восстанавливает весь запас {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} в текущем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a heroic act, they recover all their wounds and gain +2 AP this turn.

traits.locale_text: Совершая героический акт, персонаж восстанавливает весь запас здоровья и получает +2 ОД в текущем ходу.
Совершая героический акт, персонаж восстанавливает весь запас здоровья и получает +2 ОД в текущем ходу.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}か{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を実行するたびに、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ですべての{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を2獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}か{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を実行するたびに、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ですべての{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を2獲得する。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}, recupera todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} para ese {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}, recupera todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} para ese {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder eine {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} ausführt, stellt er alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her und erhält in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder eine {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} ausführt, stellt er alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her und erhält in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou à une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}, il reconstitue entièrement sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} pour le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en cours.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur accomplit un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, il reconstitue entièrement sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en cours.
